Description:
IN/SD/TPC/270122-1 -312246697 - You have failed to ensure that exposure to substances hazardous to health, namely dust released during the shotblasting process in your two shotblasting booths, is prevented or adequately controlled.

N/SD/TPC/270122-2 - 312246765 - You have not ensured that the risks from dangerous substances is either eliminated or reduced so far as is reasonably practicable, because you are spraying flammable substances without suitable controls for safe use or storage, which creates the risk of a flammable atmosphere forming and the potential for a fire which may result in serious personal injury.

IN/SD/TPC/270122-3 - 312246811 - You failed to provide evidence that your lifting equipment, namely the Doosan forklift truck (serial number FDG06-2120-20771) has been thoroughly examined by a suitably competent person within the specified time of 6 months for equipment lifting persons, or 12 months in the case of other lifting equipment.
